Animation | <center> [[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] || <center> [[File:PetayaTreeTaller.png|50px]] || <center> [[File:PetayaTreeBloom.png|50px]] || <center> [[File:PetayaTreeBerry.png|50px]] |- ! Aura (Wither Prevention) | colspan=3| <center> None || <center> Prevents ripe berries from withering |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
